sourcesContent:
import "./Post.css"; import MoreVertIcon from "@material-ui/icons/MoreVert"; import { Users } from "../../dummyData"; function Post({ post }) { return (
{Users.filter((u) => u.id === post.userId[0].username)} {post.date}
{post?.desc}
{post.like} people like this
{post.comment} comments
); } export default Post;
